original_text: Then you will think, “Who gave me all these children? Who is their father? I was alone, with no husband. They killed my children or they took them away to a foreign land. I could no longer give birth. So where did all these children come from?” ’ Then you will think, “Who gave me all these children?
korean_text: 그 때에 네가 네 마음에 이르기를 누가 나를 위하여 이들을 낳았는고 나는 자녀를 잃고 외로워졌으며 사로잡혀 유리하였거늘 이들을 누가 양육하였는고 나는 홀로 남았거늘 이들은 어디서 생겼는고 하리라

sentences.original_text: Who gave me all these children?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 나에게 이 모든 자녀들을 주었을까?

sentences.original_text: or they took them away to a foreign land
I could no longer give birth
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 아이를 낳을 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: So where did all these children come from?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이 모든 자녀들은 어디서 왔을까?

sentences.original_text: Who gave me all these children?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 나에게 이 모든 자녀들을 주었을까?
